mapper.select: SELECT POST.ID, POST.NAME, POST.CONTENTS, POST.MEMBER_ID, IFNULL(POST.CLICK_CNT, 0) AS CLICK_CNT, POST.CREATION_DATE, POST.MODIFIED_DATE, MEMBER.ID AS MID, MEMBER.LOGIN_ID, BOARD.ID AS BID, BOARD.NAME FROM POST LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON POST.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD ON POST.BOARD_ID = BOARD.ID WHERE IFNULL(POST.IS_ADMIN, 'F') != 'T' ORDER BY POST.CREATION_DATE DESC

SELECT POST.ID, POST.NAME, POST.CONTENTS, POST.MEMBER_ID, IFNULL(POST.CLICK_CNT, 0) AS CLICK_CNT, POST.CREATION_DATE, POST.MODIFIED_DATE, MEMBER.ID AS MID, MEMBER.LOGIN_ID, BOARD.ID AS BID, BOARD.NAME FROM POST LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON POST.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD ON POST.BOARD_ID = BOARD.ID WHERE POST.ID = #{id} AND IFNULL(POST.IS_ADMIN, 'F') != "T"

SELECT POST.ID, POST.NAME, POST.CONTENTS, POST.MEMBER_ID, IFNULL(POST.CLICK_CNT, 0) AS CLICK_CNT, POST.CREATION_DATE, POST.MODIFIED_DATE, MEMBER.ID AS MID, MEMBER.LOGIN_ID, BOARD.ID AS BID, BOARD.NAME FROM POST LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON POST.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.ID LEFT JOIN BOARD ON POST.BOARD_ID = BOARD.ID WHERE POST.MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND IFNULL(POST.IS_ADMIN, 'F') != "T"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (NAME, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CONTENTS, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, CLICK_CNT) VALUES ( #{NAME}, #{CREATION_DATE, typeHandler=org.almansa.app.core.typehandler.sqlite.SqliteDateTypeHandler}, #{MODIFIED_DATE, typeHandler=org.almansa.app.core.typehandler.sqlite.SqliteDateTypeHandler}, #{CONTENTS}, #{BOARD_ID}, #{MEMBER_ID}, 0 )

UPDATE POST SET NAME = #{NAME}, CREATION_DATE = #{CREATION_DATE, typeHandler=org.almansa.app.core.typehandler.sqlite.SqliteDateTypeHandler}, MODIFIED_DATE = #{MODIFIED_DATE, typeHandler=org.almansa.app.core.typehandler.sqlite.SqliteDateTypeHandler}, CONTENTS = #{CONTENTS}, BOARD_ID = #{BOARD_ID}, MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}, CLICK_CNT = #{CLICK_CNT} WHERE ID = #{ID}
